title: Identify the Initial and Final Heights
text: The tree was initially $$4$$ meters tall and grew to $$5$$ meters after a year. 🌳

title: Calculate the Increase in Height
text: Find the difference between the final height and the initial height. This is the increase in height.

title: Use the Percentage Increase Formula
text: The formula for percentage increase is: (increase/original value)*100%.

title: Calculate the Percentage Increase
text: Substitute the values into the formula: ((5-4)/4)*100%.
